snippet: Rex Ryan appeared very much on an imaginary leash as General Manager John Idzik set the conservative agenda for a news conference Tuesday, two days after the Jets wrapped up an 8-8 season.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football observes that New York Jets Coach Rex Ryan appeared to be very much on an imaginary leash during news conference with General Manager John Idzik, two days after the Jets wrapped up their third consecutive season of not making the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Rex Ryan appeared very much on an imaginary leash as General Manager John Idzik set the conservative agenda for a news conference Tuesday, two days after the Jets wrapped up an 8-8 season.

headline.main: Jets, at Least for Moment, Put Entertainment Aside
headline.print_headline: Jets, at Least for Moment, Put Entertainment Aside
